text: Mary Aroni () was a famous Greek actress. She was born in 1916 in Athens, Greece. She first appeared in theatre in 1935 and she mainly acted in theatre. She made only four cinema appearances in her acting life. She lived in Kalamaki, near Athens and she played in cinema together with Dionysis Papagiannopoulos and Lambros Konstantaras. ==References== *Who's Who 1979, pg. 53.
